questions.quote: Wait, you can't make a call like that on your way out. You can't rush that conversation.
No, it's not the money. It's my hand. It's crippled from writing and writing.
Oh, I used to love to sleep with my dolls when I was a little girl..
It's.. .. you! It's really you! Oh, I'm such a huge fan of yours. Would you mind signing this poster for me?
No I haven't spoken to her all day-uh, yeah right, um, as a matter of fact, um, she was here, and she uh, left a note, but I wasn't here, but I have the note, uh, right here.
Anyway there's at least four of them, and they're all huge. And one is bigger than the next. It's like a Russ Meyer movie.
Well, I was just curious why you didn't use an exclamation point?
Well, I'm sure things'll pick up for you soon. Elaine, maybe we should get going.
You know what you could do? I haven't eaten lunch or dinner. I can't eat this hospital food. Maybe you could run down to the deli and get me a sandwich..
That's it. Now, gimme your wallet. Got it in here, huh, fat boy!
